title: How to Make a Mountain Fold (Origami)

steps.headline: Place the origami paper on a flat surface.
steps.description: A table makes the ideal surface.

steps.headline: Place your thumbs and fingers at the ends of the crease you intend to make.
steps.description: Fold the paper behind, pinching the fold in. This raises the fold, like a mountain.

steps.headline: Smooth the crease that has been made.
steps.description: The mountain (or backward) fold is now made.

text: Place the origami paper on a flat surface. A table makes the ideal surface. Place your thumbs and fingers at the ends of the crease you intend to make.
